import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../../index2.css' import { connect } from 'react-redux' const FXBlotter = (props) => { const {fecha, bid, ask, blotterStyle, headerStyle, flexH} = {...props} return (

FX Blotter

Fecha: {fecha}
Bid: {bid} Ask: {ask}
{props.ops.map((op) => { return ( ) })}
NumOp Cliente FX Rate C / V Monto Precio
{op.numop} {op.cliente} {op.fxrate} {op.cv} {op.monto} {op.precio}
Posicion (USD) {props.posicion}
PProm Compra {props.ppcompra}
PProm Venta {props.ppventa}
Res. Trading (CLP) {props.resTrading}
Res. Posicion (CLP) {props.resPos}

Nueva Operaci√≥n

) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { fecha: state.fecha, bid: state.bid, ask: state.ask, ops: state.ops, nextNumop: state.nextNumop, posicion: state.posicion, ppcompra: state.ppcompra, ppventa: state.ppventa, resTrading: state.resTrading, resPos: state.resPos } } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return { actualizaPunta: () => dispatch({type: 'PUNTA', bid: 700.00 + Math.round(Math.random() * 100.0) / 100.0, ask: 700.30 + + Math.round(Math.random() * 100.0) / 100.0}) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(FXBlotter)
